about_the_game:
Shadow Fencer Theatre is the awkward-physics sword fighting game that lets you battle your friends in the ridiculous world of shadow puppets!

Are you ready to give the best performance of your life? Take center stage and stab your way to the top by battling your scene partner with a unique cast of characters. Whether you are a one-puppet show or sharing the stage, above all else, show the world you are the best performer on the shadowy screen.

Co-op Puppet Fights!

Turn your couch into a stage and scuffle it out in multiplayer Improv mode or act solo in a veritable variety show of game modes and skits.

Sword-flying, Arm-flailing Combat Against Friends and/or Foes!

  • Story – Only you can keep this last-of-its-kind shadow puppet theatre in business.
  • Marathon - Survive the gauntlet on your own and become the Grandmaster.
  • Improv -Grab a friend or fight solo, selecting the cast, stage and direction of the shadowy fight. Direct the Improv fights with a selection of gameplay variations, limits and more.
  • Skits - a proverbial vaudeville with over a dozen mini-games set to delight and distract. Slap, out run, and joust your frenemies.

16+ Handcrafted Characters!

Robots, Giraffes, Pirates and more! An eclectic cast so big we needed a larger dressing room!

8 Unique Stages!

Behold the power of paper cutouts on sticks and string, and their uncanny ability to set the stage and tell a story. The magic of theatre!

Original Soundtrack!

A collection of musical notes played specifically for this game!




Acting 101: Be sure to point the pointy end away from you and towards your opponent. When all else fails, just do a cheeky sword throw.
